channel.title: About this project on The Food Items Network
channel.description: Recent content in About this project on The Food Items Network

item.title: Data collection and description
item.description: Data collection The data used in the project was collected from the BilkaToGo website using the python webscraping libraries Beautiful Soup and Selenium. The scraping was done in 2 steps. Firstly the Product Id’s, the Categories and the Price of the products was collected. Secondly the Product Id’s was used to collect the product descripstions for each item. The below figure shows what specific attributes was collected in the scraping:

item.title: Network analysis
item.description: In the network analysis we will delve into details giving us insights into consumer behavior in terms of how food item are purchased together. As an overview we are going to investigate the following: The network properties to understand the overall structure that the foods-network follow by looking at the degree distribution. Investigate Assortativity to see if there is a tendency that some nodes in the network connect to other nodes that are similar in degree or based on other attributes like whether they are ecological.
